page.title: 03LOCAL SHOPS
page.content: GRETA HARTLEY WORKS IN THE LOCAL POST OFFICE .THE POST OFFICE IS ABOUT 70 YEARS OLD.THE POST OFFICE BEGAN IN 1930 AND ANDREW HALCROW FIRST RAN IT. IT USED TO BE IN A PRIVATE HOUSE AT BACKABURN.THE POSTMEN ARE GERALD .A. HALCROW AND JOHN HENRY. THE LOCAL BUTCHER IS OWNED BY ALEC JOHN HENRY.HE OPENS AT 9:00AM AND CLOSES AT 5:00PM.HE GETS HIS SUPPLIES FROM HUSON BROTHERS,BAINS AND TODDS.HE HAS OWNED THE SHOP FOR SIX YEARS. HALCROWS SHOP WAS OPENED IN 1898. DUNCAN AND CO. FIRST OWNED IT.HALCROWS TOOK OVER IN 1926.THEY GET THEIR STORES FROM BAINS AND TODDS.THERE ARE 3 OR 4 PEOPLE WORKING IN HALCROWS.IN A POWER CUT IT TAKES 2 OR 3 DAYS BEFORE THE FRIDGES GO OFF.THEIR HOURS ARE 9:00AM TO 5:30PM.
